title: Potion of beneficial mutation
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Potion                                                                                                                          |
| :--- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Potion of beneficial mutation                                                                                                   |
| Icon | [![Potion of beneficial mutation.png](/images/4/40/Potion_of_beneficial_mutation.png)](/File:Potion_of_beneficial_mutation.png) |

|   |                                                      |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A potion which gives you a supposedly good mutation. |

[Quaffing](/Quaff "Quaff") a **potion of beneficial mutation** immediately gives you a single [mutation](/Mutation "Mutation") from the list of [good mutations](/Good_mutations "Good mutations"). This can include a boost to one of your stats, free [resistances](/Resistance "Resistance"), and many more things that are (usually) helpful. Beware that some good mutations come with negative aspects, that piles of good mutations may make curing [bad mutations](/Bad_mutations "Bad mutations") much more difficult, and that each mutation you add on renders you slightly more vulnerable to [silver](/Silver "Silver") damage.

Note that [ghouls](/Ghoul "Ghoul") cannot mutate and [rot](/Rot "Rot") instead, reducing maximum [HP](/HP "HP") and possibly taking a temporary hit to [stats](/Stats "Stats") as well.

**Having the [Mutation Resistance mutation](/Good_mutations#Mutation_Resistance "Good mutations") causes this potion to fail at least 67% of the time** (100% at Rank 3). Additionally, this potion's effect may fail due to sources of [mutation resistance](/Mutation_resistance "Mutation resistance") that are not from equipment (such as being a [halfling](/Halfling "Halfling")) or physiological conflicts (attempting to give [nagas](/Naga "Naga") talons or [tengu](/Tengu "Tengu") fangs, for example). Followers of [Zin](/Zin "Zin") lose 10 [piety](/Piety "Piety") if they knowingly drink this potion, even if Zin (or another source) blocks the mutation.

## History

- Potions of cure mutation and [potions of beneficial mutation](/Potions_of_beneficial_mutation "Potions of beneficial mutation") were merged into [potions of mutation](/Potions_of_mutation "Potions of mutation") in [0.20](/0.20 "0.20").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), Zin followers would only lose piety if they gained a mutation.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), [Vampires](/Vampire "Vampire") below satiated got rotted by the potion.
- Added in [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), replacing the [potions of gain strength](/Potions_of_gain_strength "Potions of gain strength"), [dexterity](/Potion_of_gain_dexterity "Potion of gain dexterity"), and [intelligence](/Potion_of_gain_intelligence "Potion of gain intelligence").

| [Potions](/Potion "Potion")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Ambrosia](/Potion_of_ambrosia "Potion of ambrosia") • [Attraction](/Potion_of_attraction "Potion of attraction") • [Berserk rage](/Potion_of_berserk_rage "Potion of berserk rage") • [Brilliance](/Potion_of_brilliance "Potion of brilliance") • [Cancellation](/Potion_of_cancellation "Potion of cancellation") • [Curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing") • [Degeneration](/Potion_of_degeneration "Potion of degeneration") • [Enlightenment](/Potion_of_enlightenment "Potion of enlightenment") • [Experience](/Potion_of_experience "Potion of experience") • [Haste](/Potion_of_haste "Potion of haste") • [Heal wounds](/Potion_of_heal_wounds "Potion of heal wounds") • [Invisibility](/Potion_of_invisibility "Potion of invisibility") • [Lignification](/Potion_of_lignification "Potion of lignification") • [Magic](/Potion_of_magic "Potion of magic") • [Might](/Potion_of_might "Potion of might") • [Mutation](/Potion_of_mutation "Potion of mutation") • [Resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance") |
html:
Potion of beneficial mutation

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Potion
Name Potion of beneficial mutation
Icon
A potion which gives you a supposedly good mutation.

Quaffing a potion of beneficial mutation immediately gives you a single mutation from the list of good mutations. This can include a boost to one of your stats, free resistances, and many more things that are (usually) helpful. Beware that some good mutations come with negative aspects, that piles of good mutations may make curing bad mutations much more difficult, and that each mutation you add on renders you slightly more vulnerable to silver damage.

Note that ghouls cannot mutate and rot instead, reducing maximum HP and possibly taking a temporary hit to stats as well.

Having the Mutation Resistance mutation causes this potion to fail at least 67% of the time (100% at Rank 3). Additionally, this potion's effect may fail due to sources of mutation resistance that are not from equipment (such as being a halfling) or physiological conflicts (attempting to give nagas talons or tengu fangs, for example). Followers of Zin lose 10 piety if they knowingly drink this potion, even if Zin (or another source) blocks the mutation.

History

  • Potions of cure mutation and potions of beneficial mutation were merged into potions of mutation in 0.20.
  • Prior to 0.16, Zin followers would only lose piety if they gained a mutation.
  • Prior to 0.14, Vampires below satiated got rotted by the potion.
  • Added in 0.13, replacing the potions of gain strength, dexterity, and intelligence.
